: 2:
You are my husband. Out of the natural affection I have for you, I have given you the property of R.C.C. Club House, which has come into my possession by inheritance, registered in my name in the Panchayat Office as House Assessment No. 118. Since the date of the property, I have been in full possession of the property. I hereby grant you the right to a permanent income from the property. There are no other heirs or beneficiaries. With the intention of transferring the property to you, I hereby transfer to you, without any consideration, the property, valued at Rs. 10,45,000/- (literally ten lakhs and forty-five thousand rupees), free of charge, with all rights and interests, and you shall immediately take possession of the property. You shall be the sole and absolute owner of the property, pay all taxes in your name, have your name registered in the government records, and shall enjoy the property freely and freely with all rights, including the right to borrow, sell, and dispose of it. Neither I nor our heirs, We do not intend to cause any inconvenience or inconvenience to our residents, you or our heirs. This is a settlement document written in your name with my consent.
Schedule:
Vijaynagaram District, Vijaynagaram Joint Saburi Area, Vijaynagaram Mandal, Kondakarakam Gram Panchayat, Y.S.R.Nagar, Kondakarakam Village, Village Kantham Survey No. 102, House Assessment No. 118, Door No. 1-16, Real Estate R.C.C. Slab House, Measurements and Boundaries Details.

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 454 of 2026, dated 27/Jan/2026, executed by Boorle Chinna Laxmi, in favour of her Husband, Boorle Bhanu Prakash, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 60 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 1-16, assessment number 118, comprised in survey number 102 (part), situated in Kondakarakam Village and Grama Panchayt, YSR Nagar, Vizianagaram Mandal, within the District of Vizianagaram, registered at sub-registrar office Vizianagaram(R.O)(212), is bounded as follows: North by: Road South by: Vacant Site Of Others East by: RCC House of Kotakala Manga West by: Vacant Site Of Others Note:: Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per deed.

It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or
Lease Deed.

Note:: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
